extension.description: Stream videos, music, and images from your Seedr cloud storage directly to Kodi. Features: - Stream media files directly without downloading - Local QR code generation for secure mobile authentication - Automatic playlist support for audio files - Easy navigation through your Seedr folders - Access your cloud content from anywhere Requires a Seedr.cc account. Visit www.seedr.cc to sign up.
